title: Device Simulator JAVA
description: A Java Application for simulating devices. It simulates several device connections through MQTT.
detailedDescription: This an example application which simulates several device connections through MQTT protocol. It may be used for testing device management functionality.
installation: Download the .jar file. You can use it by executing "java -jar device-simulator.jar" with argument "N" which must be a number between 1-50, and it is optional (default is 50)
